        Precondition:

        Postcondition:

    • Method Detail

      • game_init

        public void game_init()
        Transformer initializes the game with the basic things
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        every player has now 8 cards from the shuffled array the paths are initialized with the findings etc.

      • get_cards_as_string

        public java.lang.String[][] get_cards_as_string()
        Accessor access the cards of the two players as strings
        Returns:
        a string array that contains the cards of the player as "knossos1"
        Precondition:
        the player's cards are initialized

      • get_last_cards_as_string

        public java.lang.String[][] get_last_cards_as_string()
        Accessor access the last played cards of the two players as strings
        Returns:
        the 8 cards (4 for each player) as strings
        Precondition:
        the player's cards are initialized

      • get_path_state

        public int[][] get_path_state()
        Accessor access the paths in an array if they have rare finding or not
        Returns:
        a 4x9 with integers that contains 1 if finding square 0 if not
        Precondition:
        the paths are initialized

      • get_stack_count

        public int get_stack_count()
        Accessor access the current card stack count of cards of the game
        Returns:
        the count of the cards of the stack
        Precondition:
        cards have been initialized and shuffled

      • get_detailed_score_players

        public int[][] get_detailed_score_players()
        Accessor return the score details and agalmatakia of the player in 2x2 array
        Returns:
        the 2x2 array that contains (0,0) score of the player1, (0,1) agalmatakia of the player 1 etc...

      • get_holdings_both_players

        public int[][] get_holdings_both_players()
        Accessor return the rare holdings of both the players in an array 2x4 k,m,f,z
        Returns:
        the 2x2 array that contains 1 and 0 if the holding is held or not
        Precondition:
        player has his holdings initialized

      • get_pawn_availability_players

        public int[][] get_pawn_availability_players()
        Accessor get the availability or not of the pawns for each player
        Returns:
        a 2x2 array with the details of the pawns if they are available or not (1,0)
        Precondition:
        players has his pawn initialized not allocated particularly

      • check_if_card_playable

        public boolean check_if_card_playable(int player,
                                      int card_index)
        Transformer checks if a card can be played by a certain player if the card to play is bigger or equal than the last played card of the anaktoro
        Parameters:
        player - is the player 0,1
        card_index - is the index of the card to be played
        Returns:
        true or false whether a card that wants to be played from the player can be played
        Precondition:
        player is [0,1] and card_index [0-7]

      • get_turn

        public int get_turn()
        Accessor returns the turn as an integer with the id of the player that plays
        Returns:
        0 is player1 plays, 1 if player2 plays
        Precondition:
        the game has started and the turn has been initialized

      • get_photographed_both_players

        public int[][] get_photographed_both_players()
        Accessor return the photographed photos of both players in an array 2x2 with the ids being the indexes and 1 if photographed -1 if not
        Returns:
        a 2x2 array that contains the ids of the photographed toixografies
        Precondition:
        toixografies of the player array is initialized

      • get_pawns_of_board_player1

        public int[][] get_pawns_of_board_player1()
        Accessor return the location and type of pawns in a 4x9 array 4 pawns 9 positions -1 position is invalid, 0 is hidden, 1 is archaio, 2 is thiseas
        Returns:
        the 2x2 array that contains -1,0,1,2 for the pawns (-1 means pawn must not be shown, 0 pawn is invisible, 1 pawn is archaiologos, 2 pawn is thiseas)
        Precondition:
        pawns and anaktora are initialized

      • get_pawns_of_board_player2

        public int[][] get_pawns_of_board_player2()
        Accessor return the location and type of pawns in a 4x9 array 4 pawns 9 positions -1 position is invalid, 0 is hidden, 1 is archaio, 2 is thiseas
        Returns:
        the 2x2 array that contains -1,0,1,2 for the pawns (-1 means pawn must not be shown, 0 pawn is invisible, 1 pawn is archaiologos, 2 pawn is thiseas)
        Precondition:
        pawns and anaktora are initialized

      • take_card_from_stack

        public boolean take_card_from_stack(int player,
                                    int card_index_to_add)
        Transformer the player has played a valid card and now its time to take one from the stack at the top and also the length is automatically decreasec
        Parameters:
        player - is the player to take the card from the stack
        card_index_to_add - is the card index to be replaced on the player's hand
        Returns:
        true or false whether taking from the stack happened successfully or not
        Precondition:
        player is [0,1] and card_index_to_add is [0-7]

      • check_if_pawn_exists

        public boolean check_if_pawn_exists(int player,
                                    int card_index)
        Observer checks whether a pawn has been placed in this path
        Parameters:
        player - player that plays the card
        card_index - the index of the card that the player wants to play and can play
        Returns:
        true if the path already has a pawn of that player else return false
        Precondition:
        player is [0,1] and card_index_to_add is [0-7]

      • set_pawn_for_player_play

        public void set_pawn_for_player_play(int player,
                                     int card_index,
                                     int choice)
        Transformer initializes a pawn for the certain path and then places it correctly
        Parameters:
        player - player that is eligible to collect(syllogi) the finding
        card_index - is index of the card we want to play
        choice - 0 is archaiologos for new pawn, 1 is thiseas for new pawn
        Precondition:
        player is [0,1] and card_index_to_add is [0-7] and choice [0,1]
        Postcondition:
        initializes the pawn to the played path

      • play_card

        public void play_card(int player,
                      int card_index)
        Transformer handles how a card is played for each Player
        Parameters:
        player - player that plays the card
        card_index - the index of the card that the player wants to play and can play
        Precondition:
        player is [0,1] and card_index is [0-7]
        Postcondition:
        appropriate moves are done depending on the card and the player played

      • play_music

        public void play_music()
        Transformer plays music according to the turn of the player
        Precondition:
        turn has been initialized
        Postcondition:
        the music of each player is played

      • get_surpassed_check_point_pawns

        public int get_surpassed_check_point_pawns()
        Accessor calculates how many pawns have surpassed the checkpoint which is (index6) 7th square
        Returns:
        the number of the pawns that have surpassed the checkpoint
        Precondition:
        pawns are initialized not allocated specifically

      • check_get_winner

        public int check_get_winner()
        Observer check for a game winner
        Returns:
        if someone won return the id of the player that won
        Precondition:
        the game has started players are initialized

      • update_turn

        public void update_turn()
        Transformer updates the turn accordingly
        Precondition:
        game has started
        Postcondition:
        the turn has been changed to the other player

      • save_game

        public void save_game()
        Transformer saves the game state
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        a txt file is made that contains the details of the current game state

      • continue_saved_game

        public void continue_saved_game()
        Transformer continues a saved game from a txt
        Precondition:
        txt file is written the same way it should from the save_game() function
        Postcondition:
        the game continues from where the txt says
